thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hubei Feilihua Quartz Glass sees FY 2017 net profit up 5 pct to 35 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hubei Feilihua Quartz Glass sees FY 2017 net profit up 5 pct to 35 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - hubei feilihua quartz glass co ltd

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Hubei Feilihua Quartz Glass Co Ltd
* Says it sees net profit for FY 2017 to increase by 5 percent to 35 percent, or to be 113.4 million yuan to 145.8 million yuan
* Says the net profit of FY 2016 was 108 million yuan
* Comments that expanded semiconductor market as main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/N3kUx9
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
